ovdesc.p: This application is the log file for the EU Savings Directive. If the field UPDATE.LOG in EU.TAX.PARAM application is set and whenever the ET customer involve in the purchase/sale of the ET security, this file gets updated with the respective transaction reference. This is a live file.

desc.p: This field hold the key of this application which is same as the key of the EU.TAX.LINK file.
This field contains the CURR.NO of each transaction reference pertaining to the REF.NO field.
This field contains the key of each transaction reference pertaining to the REF.NO field.
